list.name: Changes
list.comment:
0.0.5 - fixed bugs (buttons are properly disabled now)
TODO - CPU player - (Maybe option to choose between CPU and 2nd Player)

task.summary:
0.0.1 first Commit - finished GUI - added displaying symbols - added Round method (X and O's alternately
TODO - checkWInner() - CPU player - (Maybe option to choose between CPU and 2nd Player)

0.0.2 - added checkForWinner - added checkDraw - added endGame - changed winnerLabel to red
TODO - CPU player - (Maybe option to choose between CPU and 2nd Player) - reset Button - buttons are not really disabled and turn dark grey (focus color?)

0.0.3 - added Reset game Button + method - added CheckWinnerSymbol Method, so the WInning symbol gets displayed
BUGS - Some buttons can change one time after game is over
TODO - CPU player - (Maybe option to choose between CPU and 2nd Player) - buttons are not really disabled and turn dark grey (focus color?)
0.0.4 Git push repository - deleted not used imports

0.0.4 - added Score display - added PlayCPU Button (does not work) - added Reset game functionality
BUGS - Some buttons can change one time after game is over
TODO - CPU player - (Maybe option to choose between CPU and 2nd Player) - buttons are not really disabled and turn dark grey (focus color?)

0.0.5 - fixed bugs (buttons are properly disabled now)
TODO - CPU player - (Maybe option to choose between CPU and 2nd Player)
